title: Bug 42225: Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace
description: Bug 42225: Can't assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace
OB: When attempting to assign a command to the Ctrl+Backspace key combination, the keybinding manager incorrectly identifies it as Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word. This issue occurs on a Swiss German Keyboard with Swiss German Locale.
EB: I expect to be able to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace without any confusion. The keybinding manager should correctly recognize the Ctrl+Backspace key combination and not associate it with Ctrl+Del.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the keybinding manager.
2. Attempt to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace.
3. Notice that the keybinding manager incorrectly displays Ctrl+Del when you press Ctrl+Backspace. This behavior is observed on a Swiss German Keyboard with Swiss German Locale.
